newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +4.05 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +4.05 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown on Tuesday at 28.345 to the dollar after Monday's fixing at 28.363, and at 16.907 to the mark from 16.943.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +4.05 percent, up from Monday's +3.90.
During the minute when the central bank calculated the fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +4.02.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT) and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
